on_select.fulfillment0/@ondc/org/category: In Fulfillment0, @ondc/org/category is not a valid value in on_select and should have one of these values Immediate Delivery,Standard Delivery,Express Delivery

on_init.message.order: 'cancellation_terms' in /message/order should not be provided as those are not enabled yet
on_init.settlementWindow: Invalid settlement window in /on_init. Expected format: PTd+[MH] (e.g., PT1H, PT30M).

on_confirm.message.order: 'cancellation_terms' in /message/order should not be provided as those are not enabled yet

bpp/descriptor.name: Squadcube
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: Squadcube is a seller platform that enables multiple sellers to list and sell their products on the ONDC network.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Squadcube is a comprehensive seller platform designed to empower businesses to seamlessly list and sell their products on the ONDC (Open Network for Digital Commerce) network. By connecting sellers with a wide-reaching digital marketplace, Squadcube helps facilitate greater visibility and reach for their products while ensuring a smooth and efficient online selling experience. The platform supports multiple sellers, offering a collaborative space for them to showcase and manage their offerings within the growing ONDC ecosystem.

descriptor.name: Himalaya Wellness Store
descriptor.short_desc: Himalaya Wellness Store is a health & wellness store offering products through the ONDC platform online.
descriptor.long_desc: Himalaya Wellness Store is a health & wellness store that offers a wide range of products online through the ONDC platform. Customers can conveniently explore and purchase items from the store through this innovative digital marketplace.

descriptor.name: Himalaya Healthy Gut Probiotic 60s
descriptor.long_desc: Himalaya Healthy Gut Probiotic Gummies are a gut health supplementΓÇöa proprietary blend of probiotic and a pro-gut super fruit that helps nourish good bacteria and supports digestive health and immunity.

descriptor.name: Rumalaya Pain Relief Patches
descriptor.long_desc:
For long-lasting relief from pain
Rumalaya is a comprehensive range of products specially formulated combining the best of Nature and science, focused on holistic treatment and the management of musculoskeletal pain. Himalaya Rumalaya Pain Relief Patches are a new, convenient, and effective format that comes with the goodness of Indian Wintergreen Oil and Menthol. The patches provide long-lasting relief from acute musculoskeletal pain and muscle soreness.

Rumalaya Pain Relief Patches provide relief from back pain, knee pain, ankle sprain, shoulder pain, and neck pain. The patches start acting in 10 minutes, providing long-lasting relief for up to 12 hours, and also help reduce swelling and muscle stiffness, and improve mobility.

Rumalaya Pain Relief Patches are sweat-proof, easy to apply, convenient to use, and contain 100% natural actives.

The pack contains three units of pain relief patches.

descriptor.name: Pain Relief Oil
descriptor.long_desc:
Relieves bodyache and pain
Enriched with Sweet Flag, Drumstick, and Cedar Tree extracts.

descriptor.name: Himalaya Germ Free Baby Laundry Wash
descriptor.short_desc: Himalaya Germ Free Baby Laundry Wash, code : 1003
descriptor.long_desc:
Effectively removes germs, tough stains, and odor
99.9% germ protection* *Basis invitro lab studies on indicative organisms

-Naturally derived cleansing agents and enzyme free.
-Clean and fresh clothes with antiredeposition action.
-Free from Phthalates, SLS/SLES/ALS, Phosphate, Synthetic color, Added bleach, and Silicate.
-Dermatologically tested.
-Contains biodegradable ingredients and is safe for the environment.
-Gentle. Safe. Researched.

descriptor.name: newborn Total Care baby pants
descriptor.short_desc: newborn Total Care baby pants, code : 1005-1
descriptor.long_desc: Himalaya Newborn Total Care Baby Pants are specially designed to provide the greatest comfort and care to newborn babies. Backed with scientific research and infused with the goodness of natural ingredients, Himalaya Newborn Total Care Baby Pants come in an easy-to-wear pant-style design that offers a soft and comfortable fit and are easy to pull on and off.
